item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Jim -
I've gotten a bit wishy washy on the whole FeedBurner thing. If you subscribe to it you should still be getting updates, but I'm not as keen on linking to it as I used to be.
item.content:encoded:
@Jim –

I’ve gotten a bit wishy washy on the whole FeedBurner thing. If you subscribe to it you should still be getting updates, but I’m not as keen on linking to it as I used to be.

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Dude, whatever happened with you and Feedburner? Still using it?
item.content:encoded: Dude, whatever happened with you and Feedburner? Still using it?

item.title: By: Pete Cashmore
item.dc:creator: Pete Cashmore
item.description:
Joseph,
I'm not getting your posts through Bloglines anymore - did you consolidate all your feeds to Feedburner? I've had trouble with Feedburner and Bloglines in the past on my own blog. I went to the Feedburner forums and they tested my feeds across all the readers. Turned out it was just a problem with Bloglines. I emailed them with the feed url and the feeds started flowing again after that.
item.content:encoded:
Joseph,

I’m not getting your posts through Bloglines anymore – did you consolidate all your feeds to Feedburner? I’ve had trouble with Feedburner and Bloglines in the past on my own blog. I went to the Feedburner forums and they tested my feeds across all the readers. Turned out it was just a problem with Bloglines. I emailed them with the feed url and the feeds started flowing again after that.
